PYM: Additional core funding to Towards Transparency

description.narrative: The additional core funding to Towards Transparency aims to 5 objectives:1) Achieve overall progress in the implementation of TT?s Strategy 2025. 2) Strengthen stakeholder engagement on Open Government: This includes sustaining and expanding results of pre vious OGP project with specific focus on linking open government and innovation/digitalization efforts and strengthening OGP working group. 3) Mobilize resource and partnerships for integrity in Climate Finance and Action.4) Manage a more efficient and tra nsparent internal financial system.5) Effectively communicate and relate with other stakeholders

The core funding to Towards Transparency focuses on Open Government Partnership and Anti-Corruption in Vietnam. The full project document is prepared. The overall objective of the project is to advocate for OGP as an innovative approach to promote transpar ent and accountable governance in Vietnam. In order to achieve this objective the project will focus on 3 specific objectives: 1. Enhance civil society and other stakeholders? engagement in the OGP process and their advocacy capacityThis objective contrib utes to achieving the overall project which is strengthening the civil society's and stakeholders' engagement and capacity to the cause after which they will be able to exercise their voice and actions better in decision-making processes as well as in the OGP process. 2. Increase state interest in OGP participation OGP participation is intrinsically a government-led process therefore increasing government exposure to OGP as well as triggering their interest in this process comes equally as a priority. 3. A dvocate for anti-corruption secondary legislation to meet OGP criteriaThis objective contributes to ensuring that the anti-corruption law and related decrees which are to be adopted in 2019 are in line with international standards and address issues pertai ning to Vietnam?s future in OGP participation.
